tool_description: Monitors and tracks payment transaction status across multiple gateways with real-time updates.

transaction_ids.description: List of transaction identifiers to monitor

include_history.description: Whether to include transaction status history

error_messages: Transaction not found: One or more transaction IDs do not exist
Too many transactions: Maximum 100 transactions can be monitored at once
Gateway timeout: Unable to retrieve status from payment gateway
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to view transaction status
usage: Provide an array of transaction_ids to monitor. Set include_history to true to get detailed status change history.

transaction_statuses.description: Current status of each monitored transaction
